channel.title: Good website ideas!
channel.description: Okay so i was wondering what is a good idea for a website to do that would generate traffic and money!

item.title: Good website ideas!
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:7, topic:452267”]I really don’t understand what you mean by build it with photoshop, lol. Unless you use shitweaver then I really have no clue what you’re talking about.

The same as I tell to everyone, keep it simple and userfriendly.[/quote]

Don’t bash on dreamweaver, most companies make knowing dreamweaver a requirement. if they want to higher you as a web dev.

Read full topic

item.title: Good website ideas!
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“Samih1996, post:5, topic:452267”]Hi,

My idea would be a nice designing using photoshop, and after building it together with html + css. When it is finished you should SEO, and for making money you could buy something and sell something. If you want to link things to RSPS then you can make donator shops which i’ve seen in most servers.

Samih.[/quote]
lolwut?

Read full topic

item.title: Good website ideas!
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

I think OP is looking for a .Com website that will generate money. Something like facebook.

Forum and instant messaging on one website; that would be my idea.

item.title: Good website ideas!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I believe you’re creating a website for the wrong reasons, however, keep it simple. Try to make it more PHP orientated than just a template, more user friendly.

No over use of JavaScript, or HTML for that matter.

Use more CSS based tags than HTML.

For example, instead of

Do it through CSS, or even aligning it is better than using HTML tags all the time, for example

or

Read full topic
